methods.name: createCoordinateSystem
desc: Creates a coordinate systems that fits the chart-type with its current settings and for the given dimension.

methods.name: getChartType
desc: A string representation of the chart type.
This needs to be the service-name which can be used to create a chart type.

methods.name: getRoleOfSequenceForSeriesLabel
desc: Returns the role of the XLabeledDataSequence of which the label will be taken to identify the DataSeries in dialogs or the legend.

methods.name: getSupportedMandatoryRoles
desc: Returns a sequence of roles that are understood by this chart type.
All roles must be listed in the order in which they are usually parsed. This ensures that gluing sequences together and splitting them up apart again results in the same structure as before.
Note, that this does not involve optional roles, like error-bars.

methods.name: getSupportedOptionalRoles
desc: Returns a sequence of roles that are understood in addition to the mandatory roles (see XChartType.getSupportedMandatoryRoles()).
An example for an optional role are error-bars.

methods.name: getSupportedPropertyRoles
desc: Returns a sequence with supported property mapping roles.
An example for a property mapping role is FillColor.
